function giaiThua(n)
	if n <= 1 then
		return 1
	else
		return n * giaiThua(n-1)
	end
end

print(giaiThua(5))

end

local function teleportPlayer(player, position)
	local character = player.Character
	if character then
		character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(CFrame.new(position))
	end
end

local function makePlayerJump(player)
	local character = player.Character
	if character then
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Jump = true
		end
	end
end

makePlayerJump(game.Players.LocalPlayer)

local function setPlayerHealth(player, health)
	local character = player.Character
	if character then
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Health = health
		end
	end
end

setPlayerHealth(game.Players.LocalPlayer, 100)

local function damagePlayer(player, amount)
	local character = player.Character
	if character then
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid:TakeDamage(amount)
		end
	end
end

damagePlayer(game.Players.LocalPlayer, 10)

local function healPlayer(player, amount)
	local character = player.Character
	if character then
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + amount
		end
	end
end

healPlayer(game.Players.LocalPlayer, 10)

	local character = player.Character

		if humanoid then
			humanoid.WalkSpeed = speed
		end
	end
end

local function createSpawnLocation(position, teamName)
	local spawn = Instance.new("SpawnLocation")
	spawn.Position = position
	spawn.Anchored = true
	spawn.CanCollide = true
	spawn.Size = Vector3.new(4, 1, 4)
	
	local Teams = game:GetService("Teams")
	local team = Teams:FindFirstChild(teamName)
	if team then
		spawn.TeamColor = team.TeamColor
	end
	
	spawn.Parent = workspace
end

createSpawnLocation(Vector3.new(0, 10, 0), "Đội Đỏ")
Description: Creating a spawn location for a team

local dragging = false
local value = 0

slider.InputBegan:Connect(function(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		dragging = true
	end
end)

slider.InputEnded:Connect(function(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		dragging = false
	end
end)

game:GetService("UserInputService").InputChanged:Connect(function(input)
	if dragging and input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseMovement then
		local mousePos = game:GetService("UserInputService"):GetMouseLocation()
		local framePos = frame.AbsolutePosition
		local frameSize = frame.AbsoluteSize
		
		local relativeX = math.clamp((mousePos.X - framePos.X) / frameSize.X, 0, 1)
		slider.Position = UDim2.new(relativeX, -10, 0, 0)
		value = relativeX
		print("Giá trị: " .. value)
	end
end)

local function showNotification(message, duration)
	local notification = Instance.new("Frame")
	notification.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 50)
	notification.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0, -50)
	notification.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(50, 50, 50)
	notification.BackgroundTransparency = 0.2
	notification.Parent = script.Parent
	
	local text = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	text.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
	text.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	text.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
	text.Text = message
	text.Parent = notification
	
	notification:TweenPosition(UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0, 20), Enum.EasingDirection.Out, Enum.EasingStyle.Bounce, 0.5, true)
	
	delay(duration, function()
		notification:TweenPosition(UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0, -50), Enum.EasingDirection.Out, Enum.EasingStyle.Quad, 0.5, true, function()
			notification:Destroy()
		end)
	end)
end

showNotification("Chào mừng đến với trò chơi!", 3)

local function showDialog(title, message, callback)
	local dialog = Instance.new("Frame")
	dialog.Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 150)
	dialog.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -150, 0.5, -75)
	dialog.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
	dialog.Parent = script.Parent
	
	local titleLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	titleLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 30)
	titleLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(50, 50, 50)
	titleLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
	titleLabel.Text = title
	titleLabel.Parent = dialog
	
	local messageLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	messageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 70)
	messageLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30)
	messageLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	messageLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 0, 0)
	messageLabel.Text = message
	messageLabel.TextWrapped = true
	messageLabel.Parent = dialog
	
	local yesButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
	yesButton.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 30)
	yesButton.Position = UDim2.new(0.25, -50, 1, -40)
	yesButton.Text = "Đồng ý"
	yesButton.Parent = dialog
	
	local noButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
	noButton.Size = UDim2.new(0, 100, 0, 30)
	noButton.Position = UDim2.new(0.75, -50, 1, -40)
	noButton.Text = "Hủy"
	noButton.Parent = dialog
	
	yesButton.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function()
		dialog:Destroy()
		if callback then
			callback(true)
		end
	end)
	
	noButton.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function()
		dialog:Destroy()
		if callback then
			callback(false)
		end
	end)
end

showDialog("Xác nhận", "Bạn có muốn tiếp tục không?", function(result)
	if result then
		print("Người dùng đã đồng ý")
	else
		print("Người dùng đã hủy")
	end
end)

local function createRippleEffect(button)
	button.ClipsDescendants = true
	
	button.MouseButton1Down:Connect(function(x, y)
		local ripple = Instance.new("Frame")
		ripple.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
		ripple.Position = UDim2.new(0, x - button.AbsolutePosition.X, 0, y - button.AbsolutePosition.Y)
		ripple.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
		ripple.BackgroundTransparency = 0.7
		ripple.BorderSizePixel = 0
		ripple.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5, 0.5)
		ripple.ZIndex = button.ZIndex + 1
		ripple.Parent = button
		
		local size = math.max(button.AbsoluteSize.X, button.AbsoluteSize.Y) * 2
		
		ripple:TweenSize(
			UDim2.new(0, size, 0, size),
			Enum.EasingDirection.Out,
			Enum.EasingStyle.Quad,
			0.5,
			true,
			function()
				ripple:TweenTransparency(
					1,
					Enum.EasingDirection.Out,
					Enum.EasingStyle.Quad,
					0.5,
					true,
					function()
						ripple:Destroy()
					end
				)
			end
		)
	end)
end

local button = script.Parent
createRippleEffect(button)
Description: Creating a ripple effect for buttons

RobloxCode:
local function createProgressBar(parent, position, size)
	local frame = Instance.new("Frame")
	frame.Size = size or UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 20)
	frame.Position = position or UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0.5, -10)
	frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(200, 200, 200)
	frame.Parent = parent
	
	local fill = Instance.new("Frame")
	fill.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 1, 0)
	fill.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 255, 0)
	fill.Parent = frame
	
	local text = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	text.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
	text.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	text.Text = "0%"
	text.Parent = frame
	
	local progressBar = {}
	
	function progressBar:SetProgress(percent)
		percent = math.clamp(percent, 0, 100)
		fill:TweenSize(UDim2.new(percent/100, 0, 1, 0), Enum.EasingDirection.Out, Enum.EasingStyle.Quad, 0.2, true)
		text.Text = math.floor(percent) .. "%"
	end
	
	return progressBar
end

local bar = createProgressBar(script.Parent)

-- Ví dụ: Tăng dần từ 0% đến 100%
for i = 0, 100, 10 do
	bar:SetProgress(i)
	wait(0.5)
end

local function createLeaderboard(parent)
	local frame = Instance.new("Frame")
	frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 300)
	frame.Position = UDim2.new(1, -220, 0, 20)
	frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(50, 50, 50)
	frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.3
	frame.Parent = parent
	
	local title = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	title.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 30)
	title.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(30, 30, 30)
	title.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
	title.Text = "Bảng xếp hạng"
	title.Parent = frame
	
	local scrollingFrame = Instance.new("ScrollingFrame")
	scrollingFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, -30)
	scrollingFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30)
	scrollingFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	scrollingFrame.Parent = frame
	
	local UIListLayout = Instance.new("UIListLayout")
	UIListLayout.Padding = UDim.new(0, 2)
	UIListLayout.Parent = scrollingFrame
	
	local leaderboard = {}
	
	function leaderboard:Update(data)
		-- Xóa các mục cũ
		for _, child in pairs(scrollingFrame:GetChildren()) do
			if child:IsA("Frame") then
				child:Destroy()
			end
		end
		
		-- Thêm các mục mới
		for i, entry in ipairs(data) do
			local entryFrame = Instance.new("Frame")
			entryFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, 25)
			entryFrame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(40, 40, 40)
			entryFrame.Parent = scrollingFrame
			
			local rankLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
			rankLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 30, 1, 0)
			rankLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
			rankLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
			rankLabel.Text = i
			rankLabel.Parent = entryFrame
			
			local nameLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
			nameLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0.6, 0, 1, 0)
			nameLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0, 30, 0, 0)
			nameLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
			nameLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255)
			nameLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
			nameLabel.Text = entry.name
			nameLabel.Parent = entryFrame
			
			local scoreLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
			scoreLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0.4, -30, 1, 0)
			scoreLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0.6, 0, 0, 0)
			scoreLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
			scoreLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 0)
			scoreLabel.Text = entry.score
			scoreLabel.Parent = entryFrame
		end
		
		scrollingFrame.CanvasSize = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, #data * 27)
	end
	
	return leaderboard
end

local leaderboard = createLeaderboard(script.Parent)

local function createCloth(position, size, resolution)
	local cloth = Instance.new("Part")
	cloth.Anchored = true
	cloth.CanCollide = false
	cloth.Transparency = 1
	cloth.Position = position
	cloth.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
	cloth.Parent = workspace
	
	local points = {}
	local constraints = {}
	
	-- Tạo lưới các điểm
	for x = 0, resolution do
		points[x] = {}
		for y = 0, resolution do
			local point = Instance.new("Part")
			point.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball
			point.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
			point.Position = position + Vector3.new(
				(x / resolution - 0.5) * size.X,
				0,
				(y / resolution - 0.5) * size.Z
			)
			point.Anchored = (x == 0 or x == resolution) and (y == 0 or y == resolution)
			point.CanCollide = false
			point.Parent = cloth
			
			points[x][y] = point
		end
	end
	
	-- Tạo các ràng buộc
	for x = 0, resolution do
		for y = 0, resolution do
			if x < resolution then
				local constraint = Instance.new("RopeConstraint")
				constraint.Attachment0 = createAttachment(points[x][y])
				constraint.Attachment1 = createAttachment(points[x+1][y])
				constraint.Length = (points[x][y].Position - points[x+1][y].Position).Magnitude
				constraint.Parent = cloth
				table.insert(constraints, constraint)
			end
			
			if y < resolution then
				local constraint = Instance.new("RopeConstraint")
				constraint.Attachment0 = createAttachment(points[x][y])
				constraint.Attachment1 = createAttachment(points[x][y+1])
				constraint.Length = (points[x][y].Position - points[x][y+1].Position).Magnitude
				constraint.Parent = cloth
				table.insert(constraints, constraint)
			end
		end
	end
	
	return cloth, points, constraints
end

local function createAttachment(part)
	local attachment = Instance.new("Attachment")
	attachment.Parent = part
	return attachment
end

local cloth, points, constraints = createCloth(
	Vector3.new(0, 10, 0),
	Vector3.new(10, 0, 10),
	10
)

local frame = script.Parent

local function animateUI()
	-- Hiệu ứng xuất hiện
	frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0, -200)
	frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	frame.Visible = true
	
	frame:TweenPosition(
		UDim2.new(0.5, -100, 0.5, -100),
		Enum.EasingDirection.Out,
		Enum.EasingStyle.Bounce,
		0.5,
		true
	)
	
	for i = 1, 0, -0.1 do
		frame.BackgroundTransparency = i
		wait(0.05)
	end
end

animateUI()

local part = script.Parent

local points = {
	Vector3.new(0, 5, 0),
	Vector3.new(10, 10, 0),
	Vector3.new(10, 10, 10),
	Vector3.new(0, 5, 10),
	Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)
}

local function animatePath()
	for i = 1, #points - 1 do
		local startPoint = points[i]
		local endPoint = points[i+1]
		
		local tweenInfo = TweenInfo.new(
			2,
			Enum.EasingStyle.Linear,
			Enum.EasingDirection.InOut
		)
		
		local tween = game:GetService("TweenService"):Create(
			part,
			tweenInfo,
			{Position = endPoint}
		)
		
		part.Position = startPoint
		tween:Play()
		tween.Completed:Wait()
	end
end

while true do
	animatePath()
end

local musicService = {}

function musicService:Init()
	self.sound = Instance.new("Sound")
	self.sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://142376088" -- ID âm nhạc
	self.sound.Volume = 0.3
	self.sound.Looped = true
	self.sound.Parent = workspace
end

function musicService:Play()
	self.sound:Play()
end

function musicService:Stop()
	self.sound:Stop()
end

function musicService:SetVolume(volume)
	self.sound.Volume = volume
end

function musicService:Fade(targetVolume, duration)
	local startVolume = self.sound.Volume
	local startTime = tick()
	
	while tick() - startTime < duration do
		local alpha = (tick() - startTime) / duration
		self.sound.Volume = startVolume + (targetVolume - startVolume) * alpha
		wait()
	end
	
	self.sound.Volume = targetVolume
end

musicService:Init()
musicService:Play()

-- Ví dụ: Sau 10 giây, giảm dần âm lượng
wait(10)
musicService:Fade(0, 3)

local character = script.Parent
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

local footstepSounds = {
	[Enum.Material.Grass] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Sand] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Concrete] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Wood] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Metal] = "rbxassetid://142376088"
}

local sound = Instance.new("Sound")
sound.Volume = 0.5
sound.Parent = character.HumanoidRootPart

humanoid.Running:Connect(function(speed)
	if speed > 0.1 then
		local raycastResult = workspace:Raycast(
			character.HumanoidRootPart.Position,
			Vector3.new(0, -10, 0),
			RaycastParams.new()
		)
		
		if raycastResult and raycastResult.Instance then
			local material = raycastResult.Instance.Material
			local soundId = footstepSounds[material] or footstepSounds[Enum.Material.Concrete]
			
			if soundId and not sound.IsPlaying then
				sound.SoundId = soundId
				sound:Play()
			end
		end
	end
end)

local part = script.Parent

local collisionSounds = {
	[Enum.Material.Grass] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Sand] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Concrete] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Wood] = "rbxassetid://142376088",
	[Enum.Material.Metal] = "rbxassetid://142376088"
}

local sound = Instance.new("Sound")
sound.Volume = 0.5
sound.Parent = part

part.Touched:Connect(function(otherPart)
	if otherPart.CanCollide then
		local material = otherPart.Material
		local soundId = collisionSounds[material] or collisionSounds[Enum.Material.Concrete]
		
		if soundId and not sound.IsPlaying then
			sound.SoundId = soundId
			sound:Play()
		end
	end
end)

local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local playerData = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("PlayerData")

local function saveData(player)
	local data = {
		coins = 100,
		level = 5,
		items = {"sword", "shield", "potion"}
	}
	
	local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
		playerData:SetAsync(player.UserId, data)
	end)
	
	if success then
		print("Đã lưu dữ liệu cho " .. player.Name)
	else
		print("Lỗi khi lưu dữ liệu: " .. errorMessage)
	end
end

local function loadData(player)
	local success, data = pcall(function()
		return playerData:GetAsync(player.UserId)
	end)
	
	if success and data then
		print("Đã tải dữ liệu cho " .. player.Name)
		return data
	else
		print("Không tìm thấy dữ liệu hoặc có lỗi")
		return {
			coins = 0,
			level = 1,
			items = {}
		}
	end
end

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	local data = loadData(player)
	-- Sử dụng dữ liệu
end)

game.Players.PlayerRemoving:Connect(function(player)
	saveData(player)
end)

local currencyService = {}

function currencyService:Init()
	self.DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
	self.currencyStore = self.DataStoreService:GetDataStore("PlayerCurrency")
	self.cache = {}
end

function currencyService:GetCoins(player)
	if self.cache[player.UserId] then
		return self.cache[player.UserId]
	end
	
	local success, coins = pcall(function()
		return self.currencyStore:GetAsync(player.UserId) or 0
	end)
	
	if success then
		self.cache[player.UserId] = coins
		return coins
	else
		return 0
	end
end

function currencyService:AddCoins(player, amount)
	local currentCoins = self:GetCoins(player)
	local newCoins = currentCoins + amount
	
	self.cache[player.UserId] = newCoins
	
	-- Lưu vào DataStore
	spawn(function()
		local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
			self.currencyStore:SetAsync(player.UserId, newCoins)
		end)
		
		if not success then
			print("Lỗi khi lưu tiền: " .. errorMessage)
		end
	end)
	
	return newCoins
end

function currencyService:RemoveCoins(player, amount)
	local currentCoins = self:GetCoins(player)
	local newCoins = math.max(0, currentCoins - amount)
	
	self.cache[player.UserId] = newCoins
	
	-- Lưu vào DataStore
	spawn(function()
		local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
			self.currencyStore:SetAsync(player.UserId, newCoins)
		end)
		
		if not success then
			print("Lỗi khi lưu tiền: " .. errorMessage)
		end
	end)
	
	return newCoins
end

currencyService:Init()

-- Ví dụ sử dụng
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	local coins = currencyService:GetCoins(player)
	print(player.Name .. " có " .. coins .. " xu")
end)

local experienceService = {}

function experienceService:Init()
	self.DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
	self.experienceStore = self.DataStoreService:GetDataStore("PlayerExperience")
	self.cache = {}
	
	-- Cấu hình cấp độ
	self.levelConfig = {}
	for i = 1, 100 do
		self.levelConfig[i] = 100 * i * i -- Công thức tính XP cần cho mỗi cấp
	end
end

function experienceService:GetData(player)
	if self.cache[player.UserId] then
		return self.cache[player.UserId]
	end
	
	local success, data = pcall(function()
		return self.experienceStore:GetAsync(player.UserId) or {level = 1, xp = 0}
	end)
	
	if success then
		self.cache[player.UserId] = data
		return data
	else
		return {level = 1, xp = 0}
	end
end

function experienceService:AddExperience(player, amount)
	local data = self:GetData(player)
	local currentLevel = data.level
	local currentXP = data.xp
	
	-- Thêm XP
	currentXP = currentXP + amount
	
	-- Kiểm tra lên cấp
	while currentLevel < #self.levelConfig and currentXP >= self.levelConfig[currentLevel] do
		currentXP = currentXP - self.levelConfig[currentLevel]
		currentLevel = currentLevel + 1
		
		-- Thông báo lên cấp
		self:OnLevelUp(player, currentLevel)
	end
	
	-- Cập nhật dữ liệu
	data.level = currentLevel
	data.xp = currentXP
	self.cache[player.UserId] = data
	
	-- Lưu vào DataStore
	spawn(function()
		local success, errorMessage = pcall(function()
			self.experienceStore:SetAsync(player.UserId, data)
		end)
		
		if not success then
			print("Lỗi khi lưu XP: " .. errorMessage)
		end
	end)
	
	return data
end

function experienceService:OnLevelUp(player, newLevel)
	print(player.Name .. " đã lên cấp " .. newLevel .. "!")
	-- Thêm phần thưởng lên cấp ở đây
end

function experienceService:GetLevel(player)
	local data = self:GetData(player)
	return data.level
end

function experienceService:GetXP(player)
	local data = self:GetData(player)
	return data.xp
end

function experienceService:GetXPForNextLevel(player)
	local data = self:GetData(player)
	return self.levelConfig[data.level]
end

experienceService:Init()

-- Ví dụ sử dụng
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	local data = experienceService:GetData(player)
	print(player.Name .. " đang ở cấp " .. data.level .. " với " .. data.xp .. " XP")
end)
